topic.title: HELP!!
topic.body:
#### I cloned a new site from [ZeroBlog](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/), but there are 7.45M optional files in this cloned site (**i haven't edited it yet**).
　
　

#### Why?
　
　
#### Can those files be deleted?
　
　
#### @Nofish

1540153172_1CT7RxDQNPEE8X78bDkUPhuaaUUix.body:
> [nofish](#comment_1205_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Actually it's a bug: Cloning does not removes the optional files from content.json. It's not a big issue, but you can remove it from the content.json file by hand, then sign/publish it using the sidebar. (I have created an issue for it on github, so I will fix it later)

Great! thank you for the job.
